description: As upper right triangle: ascending wiggly sums to n where first term is k (sums in which terms alternately increase and decrease; zigzag partitions).
formula: If n>k>0 T(n, k)=sum_j[S(n-k, j)] over j>k and if n>0 T(n, n)=1; where S(n, k)=A059883(n, k) and if n>k>0, S(n, k)=sum_j[T(n-k, j)] over k>j (note reversal) and if n>0 S(n, n)=1.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 05 2001
